amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $74,000,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $74,000,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chaffetz amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 245 (Roll no. 310).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Chaffetz amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 245 (Roll no. 310).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Chaffetz.
